orderProcessingDescription: We’ve received your order after payment. It’s now stored in our system and being prepared.
orderPackagingDescription: Your items are being carefully packed and prepared for shipment.

helpCenterSubtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need
noResultsMessage: Try different keywords or browse categories above
howToPlaceOrderQuestion: How do I place an order?
howToPlaceOrderAnswer: To place an order, browse our products, add items to your cart, proceed to checkout, fill in your shipping information, choose your payment method, and confirm your order. You'll receive an order confirmation email once your purchase is complete.
paymentMethodsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely using SSL encryption to protect your financial information.
shippingTimeAnswer: Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days, while express shipping takes 1-3 business days. International shipping may take 7-21 business days depending on your location. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.
returnPolicyAnswer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and in the same condition as received. To initiate a return, contact our customer service or use your account dashboard.
createAccountQuestion: Do I need an account to shop?
createAccountAnswer: While you can shop as a guest, creating an account allows you to track orders, save favorites, view order history, manage returns, and enjoy faster checkout. Registration is free and takes just a few minutes.
trackOrderQuestion: How can I track my order?
trackOrderAnswer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your package using this number on our website or the carrier's website. Registered users can also track orders in their account dashboard.
paymentSecurityAnswer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption and PCI DSS compliance to protect your payment information. We never store your full credit card details on our servers, and all transactions are processed through secure payment gateways.
refundProcessQuestion: How long does a refund take?
refundProcessAnswer: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days after we receive and inspect your returned item. The refund will be credited to your original payment method. Bank processing times may vary from 5-10 business days.
sendInquirySubtitle: Have a specific question? Send us a message and we'll get back to you soon!
messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
inquirySubmitSuccess: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
contactMessage: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help!

cashPaymentVerifiedMessage: Payment has been verified for your order placed with the 'Pay with Cash' method. Your order is now being processed for delivery.
reviewingRefundStatus: We are reviewing your refund status.
refundedToOriginalMethod: Refunded to the original payment method.
refundSentToBankDetails: The refund was sent to the bank details you provided via message.

refundFailedNoPayment: A refund cannot be processed for this order because no payment was made at the time of purchase.
refundCompletedMessage: We have successfully sent the refund for this order via the selected method. This order is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us!
